%% Direct Offers - Job Status Transitions %% Converted from docs/architecture/DIRECT_OFFERS_WORKFLOW_VISUAL.md stateDiagram-v2 [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> direct_offer: Client creates direct offer note right of direct_offer Job created Cleaner assigned Awaiting cleaner response end note direct_offer --> bid_accepted: Cleaner accepts
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) direct_offer --> declined: Cleaner declines
(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) note right of declined END STATE Cleaner unassigned Job becomes private Client can repost end note declined --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] bid_accepted --> confirmed: Client pays
(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) note right of confirmed Cleaner confirmed Payment successful Normal workflow begins end note confirmed --> ready_to_start: 30min before
scheduled time ready_to_start --> in_progress: Cleaner starts job in_progress --> awaiting_review: Cleaner finishes
(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) awaiting_review --> completed: Client submits review note right of completed END STATE Payout triggered Job archived after 48h end note completed --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] direct_offer --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels bid_accepted --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels confirmed --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels ready_to_start --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels in_progress --> cancelled: Client/Admin
cancels note right of cancelled END STATE Can happen at any stage Refund if payment made end note cancelled --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
